General.Name: Yunnan Xiyi Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Jianshe Industry Group (Yunnan) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive engine connecting rods for cars, mini-cars, and light-duty vehicles in China and internationally. It also offers various industrial products and components. The company was formerly known as Yunnan Xiyi Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jianshe Industry Group (Yunnan) Co., Ltd. in July 2023. Jianshe Industry Group (Yunnan) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1939 and is based in Kunming, China.
